actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide sufficient flexibility in Federal employee work schedules to allow Federal employees to participate in religious observances.

summary.text: Requires the granting of compensatory time off for Federal employees who wish to attend religious observances.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide sufficient flexibility in Federal employee work schedules to allow Federal employees to participate in religious observances.
